entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.9rc1 release schedule
entry.summary: The Bitcoin team is preparing for a 0.9rc1 release in February 2014, after a long period without major updates. Many new features and improvements have been added to the master branch, but there are still some open issues that need to be resolved before the release. The team encourages users to report any bugs or suggest additional features that should be included in this release. A link to the open issues on GitHub is provided.
